title: Existing service
context: [ยง261E-20] Existing service. (a) As of the effective date of enactment of all required federal legislation, any person providing air transportation with turnaround service between two points, both of which are within the State of Hawaii pursuant to authority granted by the United States Department of Transportation, shall be deemed qualified and shall be issued a certificate pursuant to this chapter. (b) For the purposes of this section, &ldquo;turnaround service&rdquo; means the operation of an aircraft that only serves points within the State of Hawaii. [L Sp 2008, c 1, pt of ยง2]
